Grand Theft Auto V

  • About the game
  • Contacts

Grand Theft Auto V is one of the most popular games in the world and has received high ratings on many gaming platforms. This is a third-person crime shooter that is famous not only for its intense storyline, but also for its huge open world.

About the game

Grand Theft Auto V is a 3rd person action crime game that has been highly rated on many gaming platforms. It was released in 2013 and was one of the very first games to allow players to switch between different characters as they play. A huge open world, an interesting storyline and many tasks - all this makes Grand Theft Auto V one of the best representatives of its genre. In the game, you can control several characters, each of which has its own unique skills and characteristics. In addition, the player can freely move around the game world, participate in various missions and tasks, receive rewards and develop their character. If you love crime games, then Grand Theft Auto V is one of the best games in its genre.

Interesting facts about the game

  • 1

    Grand Theft Auto V was released in 2013 and still remains one of the most popular games in the world.

  • 2

    The game has been nominated for many prestigious awards and won many awards, including the Best Game Campaign Award.

  • 3

    Grand Theft Auto V is rated M ("Mature"), which means that the game is not recommended for those under 17 years of age.

  • 4

    Grand Theft Auto V was one of the very first games to include the ability to play as multiple characters.

  • 5

    The game offers a huge open world to explore and many tasks for the player to complete at their own discretion.

  • 6

    Grand Theft Auto V is also known for its online mode, which allows players to play together in a massive open world.

  • 7

    Despite the criticism and negative view of many, Grand Theft Auto V remains one of the best games of all time.

  • More facts

Reviews

Jack

Nikau

Grand Theft Auto V is not just a game, it is a life that can be considered not only as entertainment, but also as an encyclopedia of the social problems of our world.

Amaia

Despite criticism and controversy, Grand Theft Auto V remains one of the best games of all time, which is hard to find a suitable replacement and not skip again through its interesting world.
